content.en: Blockchain for IoV: Researchers are exploring how blockchain technology can improve various aspects of the Internet of Vehicles (IoV). They are investigating the use of blockchain-based protocols, smart contracts, and consensus algorithms to enhance trust management, certificateless key agreement, privacy and authentication, data sharing, authentication, security, incentive mechanisms, routing mechanisms, data storage and processing, information sharing, trust and privacy, access control, and secure data transfer in the IoV. These algorithms aim to provide efficient, secure, and anonymous solutions for the challenges faced in the IoV.
content.da: Blockchain for IoV: Forskere undersøger, hvordan blockchain-teknologi kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af Internet of Vehicles (IoV). De undersøger brugen af blockchain-baserede protokoller, smart contracts og konsensusalgoritmer for at forbedre tillidsstyring, nøgleaftaler uden certifikater, privatlivsbeskyttelse og autentifikation, dataudveksling, sikkerhed, incitamentsmekanismer, ruteringsmekanismer, datalagring og -behandling, informationsdeling, tillid og privatlivsbeskyttelse, adgangskontrol og sikker dataoverførsel i IoV. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at levere effektive, sikre og anonyme løsninger på de udfordringer, IoV står over for.
